name: Organochlorine and total mercury in bivalve Anadara tuberculosa and other species from the Nicoya Gulf, Costa Rica in 1988
description: Contamination level by PCB, organochlorines pesticides and mercury for Anadara tuberculosa and other species at Punta Morales, Puerto Alto and Jicaralduring 2 samplingperiods in 1988. The datawere digitized by VLIZ from the original report: de la Cruz,E. (1989). Organochlorine and total mercury in the Anadara tuberculosa bivalve and other species fromthe Nicoya Gulf,Costa Rica. MSc Thesis.KBIN: Brussel. 59 pp.
